channel.title: Help me out again!
channel.description: Ok...i add this chest that gives you a item when you get a key like this.. [code] addItem(1129,1); [/code] what i want to know is what do i put to make it RANDOM items so i don't get Item 1129 all the time. Just like adding random item drops from monster.. just like crystal chest! Thanks

item.title: Help me out again!
item.dc:creator: @Pie_Lord Pie Lord
item.description:
@Pie_Lord wrote:

also this is what i add

public static int torso[] = {4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,6137,6137,6137,6137,2615,2615,2615,3101,3101,3101,3101,1129,1129};

    public static int randomtorso()
    {
    	return torso[(int)(Math.random()*torso.length)];
    }	
public static int torso2[] = {5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,6137,6137,6137,6137,2615,2615,2615,3101,3101,3101,3101,1129,1129};

    public static int randomtorso2()
    {
    	return torso2[(int)(Math.random()*torso2.length)];
    }
public static int skirt[] = {5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,5698,6137,6137,6137,6137,2615,2615,2615,3101,3101,3101,3101,1845,1845};

    public static int randomskirt()
    {
    	return skirt[(int)(Math.random()*skirt.length)];
    }
public static int skirt2[] = {4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,4151,6137,6137,6137,6137,2615,2615,2615,3101,3101,3101,3101,1845,1845};

    public static int randomskirt2()
    {
    	return skirt2[(int)(Math.random()*skirt2.length)];
    }			
}

i want to give me 2 random items

item.title: Help me out again!

item.description:
@Pie_Lord wrote:

item.title: Help me out again!
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Use this:

addItem(Item2.METHOD, 1);

Make a method in Item2.java and replace METHOD with the method you make.

Read full topic
